sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_67e2ab76dba804106fedf53a29961905
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.UpdateSetContent</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>UpdateSetContent</name><script><![CDATA[var UpdateSetContent = Class.create();
UpdateSetContent.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	getContent:function(data,sysID){
	//var string = "";

var attCreator = new GlideRecord('ecc_queue');
attCreator.agent = "AttachmentCreator";
attCreator.topic = "AttachmentCreator";
attCreator.name = 'UpdateSetFile' +":" + 'application/xml';
attCreator.source = "u_updatesetdeploy"+":"+sysID;
attCreator.payload = data; 
attCreator.insert();
//return attSysID;
	},
    type: 'UpdateSetContent'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-10-21 13:07:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>67e2ab76dba804106fedf53a29961905</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UpdateSetContent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_67e2ab76dba804106fedf53a29961905</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-10-22 05:34:21</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_number_c2224307db2844106fedf53a2996196d
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_number"><sys_number action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category display_value="" name="u_updatesetdeploy">u_updatesetdeploy</category><maximum_digits>7</maximum_digits><number>1000</number><prefix>ATT</prefix><sys_class_name>sys_number</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-10-22 05:20:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>c2224307db2844106fedf53a2996196d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ATT</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_number_c2224307db2844106fedf53a2996196d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-10-22 05:20:11</sys_updated_on></sys_number></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_f3fb80cfdb2c04106fedf53a29961925
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_remote_update_set</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sys_remote_update_set">state=previewed^EQ<item display_value="Previewed" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="previewed"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Jenkins- Commit Update Set</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[var problem = new GlideRecord('sys_update_preview_problem');
problem.addQuery('type=error^status=^'.concat('remote_update_set=', current.sys_id, '^ORremote_update_set.remote_base_update_set=', current.sys_id));
problem._query();
//gs.info("[CICD] : problem lookup query"+ problem.getEncodedQuery())
var issues = [];
while (problem._next()) {
    issues.push({
        type: problem.getValue('type'),
        name: problem.getValue('description'),
        link: gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri').concat(problem.getLink(true))
    });
}
if (issues.length) {
    throw {
        code: 409,
        error: {
            name: 'Update Set Preview Problems',
            message: 'Update collisions must be resolved manually.',
            updateSet: gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri').concat(problem.getElement('remote_update_set').getRefRecord().getLink(true)),
            warnings: issues
        },
        status: 'failure'
    };
}

var del = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
del.addQuery('action=DELETE^'.concat('remote_update_set=', current.sys_id, '^ORremote_update_set.remote_base_update_set=', current.sys_id, '^nameDOES NOT CONTAINsys_dictionary_override^nameSTARTSWITHsys_dictionary^ORnameSTARTSWITHsys_db_object^ORnameSTARTSWITHvar_dictionary^ORnameSTARTSWITHsvc_extension_variable^ORnameSTARTSWITHwf_activity_variable^ORnameSTARTSWITHatf_input_variable^ORnameSTARTSWITHatf_output_variable^ORnameSTARTSWITHsys_atf_variable^ORnameSTARTSWITHsys_atf_remembered_values^ORDERBYtype^ORDERBYname'));
//gs.info("[CICD] : problem lookup query" + del.getEncodedQuery())
del._query();
while (del._next()) {
    issues.push({
        type: del.getValue('type'),
        name: del.getValue('name')
    });
}
if (issues.length) {
    throw {
        code: 409,
        error: {
            name: 'Data Loss Warning',
            message: 'If you commit this update set, the system will automatically delete all data stored in the tables and columns that are defined in these Customer Updates',
            updateSet: gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri').concat('sys_remote_update_set.do?sys_id=', current.sys_id),
            warnings: issues
        },
        status: 'failure'
    };
}


// only commit if 'deploy' is set
var progress_id = null;
var rus = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
if (rus.get(current.sys_id)) {
    if (rus.remote_base_update_set.nil()) {
        /*
            Commit the update set.
            code from /sys_ui_action.do?sys_id=c38b2cab0a0a0b5000470398d9e60c36 
            calling /sys_script_include.do?sys_id=d14a6c27eff22000c6845a3615c0fb5d
        */
        var commitResult = new UpdateSetCommitAjax((function() {
            var params = {
                sysparm_type: 'commitRemoteUpdateSet',
                sysparm_remote_updateset_sys_id: current.sys_id
            };
            return {
                getParameter: function(paramName) {
                    return params[paramName];
                }
            };
        })(), new GlideXMLDocument(), '').process();
        progress_id = commitResult.split(',')[0];
    } else {
        /*
            HierarchyUpdateSetCommitAjax
            code from /sys_ui_action.do?sys_id=addc9e275bb01200abe48d5511f91a78
            calling /sys_script_include.do?sys_id=fcfc9e275bb01200abe48d5511f91aea
        */
        var updateSet = new GlideRecord("sys_remote_update_set");
        if (updateSet.get(rus.remote_base_update_set)) {
            var worker = new SNC.HierarchyUpdateSetScriptable();
            progress_id = worker.commitHierarchy(updateSet.sys_id);
        } else {
            throw Error("Batch-UpdateSet not found for update-set with id" + current.sys_id);
        }
    }
} else {
    throw Error("UpdateSet not found with id" + current.sys_id);
}

var us = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
if (us.get('remote_sys_id', current.sys_id)) {
    current.targetUpdateSetSysId = us.getValue('sys_id');
    current.state = 'committed';
    current.update();
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-10-21 16:46:13</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f3fb80cfdb2c04106fedf53a29961925</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Jenkins- Commit Update Set</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_f3fb80cfdb2c04106fedf53a29961925</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-10-22 05:39:44</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=f3fb80cfdb2c04106fedf53a29961925"/></record_update>

})(current);]]></calculation><choice/><choice_field/><choice_table/><column_label/><comments/><create_roles/><default_value/><defaultsort/><delete_roles/><dependent/><dependent_on_field/><display>false</display><dynamic_creation>false</dynamic_creation><dynamic_creation_script/><dynamic_default_value/><dynamic_ref_qual/><element/><element_reference>false</element_reference><foreign_database/><function_definition/><function_field>false</function_field><internal_type display_value="Collection">collection</internal_type><mandatory>false</mandatory><max_length>40</max_length><name>u_updatesetdeploy</name><next_element/><primary>false</primary><read_only>false</read_only><read_roles/><reference/><reference_cascade_rule/><reference_floats>false</reference_floats><reference_key/><reference_qual/><reference_qual_condition/><reference_type/><sizeclass/><spell_check>false</spell_check><staged>false</staged><sys_class_name>sys_dictionary</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-10-21 13:02:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>b7722376dba804106fedf53a29961957</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>u_updatesetdeploy</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_dictionary_u_updatesetdeploy_null</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-10-22 05:16:12</sys_updated_on><table_reference>false</table_reference><text_index>false</text_index><unique>false</unique><use_dependent_field>false</use_dependent_field><use_dynamic_default>false</use_dynamic_default><use_reference_qualifier>simple</use_reference_qualifier><virtual>false</virtual><widget/><write_roles/><xml_view>false</xml_view></sys_dictionary></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_7cd8cb65db2800106fedf53a29961949
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Push Update Set</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	
var data =request.body.dataString;
	gs.log(data);
	
var currentdate = new GlideDate();

var gr = new GlideRecord('u_updatesetdeploy');
	gr.initialize();
	gr.u_description = 'Update Set Deploy from Jenkins' + currentdate.getByFormat("MM-dd-yyyy");
var sysID = gr.insert();
	
var xml = new UpdateSetContent().getContent(data,sysID);

var xmlString = new sn_customerservice.GetContent().getContent(sysID);

	//gs.log("XML" +xmlString);
	//gs.log(xmlString.isValid());
 var xmldoc = new XMLDocument(xmlString);
// gs.log(xmldoc.isValid()); 
var nodeLength = (xmldoc.getNodes("/unload/sys_remote_update_set")).getLength();
//gs.log("Length" +nodeLength);

var ID = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/remote_sys_id");
// //gs.log("SysID" +sysID);
	var rSysID;
var remoteSet = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
 remoteSet.addQuery('remote_sys_id',ID);
 remoteSet.query();
 if(!(remoteSet.next()))
	{
for(var k=0; k<nodeLength; k++)
{
 remoteSet.initialize();
remoteSet.name= xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/name");
//remoteSet.sys_id = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/remote_sys_id");
remoteSet.remote_sys_id = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/remote_sys_id");
remoteSet.application = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/application");
remoteSet.application_name = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/application_name");
remoteSet.application_scope = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/application_scope");	
remoteSet.state = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/state");
remoteSet.application_version =xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/application_version");
remoteSet.collisions = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/collisions");
remoteSet.commit_date = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/commit_date");
remoteSet.deleted = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/deleted");
remoteSet.description = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/description");
remoteSet.inserted = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/inserted");
remoteSet.origin_sys_id = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/origin_sys_id");
remoteSet.parent = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/parent");
remoteSet.release_date = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/release_date");
remoteSet.remote_base_update_set = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/remote_base_update_set");
remoteSet.remote_parent_id = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/remote_parent_id");
remoteSet.summary = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/summary");
remoteSet.sys_class_name = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/sys_class_name");
remoteSet.sys_created_by = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/sys_created_by");
remoteSet.sys_created_on = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/sys_created_by");
remoteSet.sys_mod_count = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/sys_created_by");
remoteSet.sys_updated_by = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/sys_updated_by");
remoteSet.sys_updated_on = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/sys_updated_on");
remoteSet.update_set = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/update_set");
remoteSet.update_source = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_remote_update_set/update_source");
rSysID = remoteSet.insert();
}
}
var xmlNodeLength = (xmldoc.getNodes("/unload/sys_update_xml")).getLength();
var customUpdate = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
for (var i=1; i<=xmlNodeLength;i++)
	{
		customUpdate.initialize();
		customUpdate.name = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_update_xml["+i+"]/name");
		customUpdate.application =  xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_update_xml["+i+"]/application");
		customUpdate.payload = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_update_xml["+i+"]/payload");
		customUpdate.payload_hash = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_update_xml["+i+"]/payload_hash");
		customUpdate.sys_recorded_at = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_update_xml["+i+"]/sys_recorded_at");
		customUpdate.table = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_update_xml["+i+"]/table");
		customUpdate.target_name = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_update_xml["+i+"]/target_name");
		customUpdate.type = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_update_xml["+i+"]/type");
		customUpdate.update_domain = xmldoc.getNodeText("/unload/sys_update_xml["+i+"]/update_domain");
		customUpdate.remote_update_set = rSysID;
		customUpdate.insert();
	}
	//}

            
var responseBody = {};
responseBody.status = "OK";
response.setBody(responseBody);
response.setStatus(201); // Created
// return response;
	
})(request, response);
]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/336501/jenkins_integration/deploy</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/deploy</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-10-17 14:00:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>7cd8cb65db2800106fedf53a29961949</sys_id><sys_mod_count>93</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Push Update Set</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_7cd8cb65db2800106fedf53a29961949</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-10-22 05:46:14</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Jenkins Integration">cd48c365db2800106fedf53a29961959</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

var helper = new GitMyStuff();
helper.process();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-10-21 18:23:42</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c0986c4fdbac04106fedf53a2996191f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GitHub - Push Update Set</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c0986c4fdbac04106fedf53a2996191f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-10-22 05:41:19</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c0986c4fdbac04106fedf53a2996191f"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_ui_section caption="" section_id="84e36bb6dba804106fedf53a29961933" sys_domain="global" table="u_updatesetdeploy" sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_990b4087db2c04106fedf53a299619e0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_remote_update_set</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sys_remote_update_set">state=loaded^EQ<item display_value="Loaded" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="loaded"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Jenkins - Preview Update Set</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[var rus = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
rus.addQuery('remote_sys_id', 'STARTSWITH', current.remote_sys_id);
//rus.addQuery('state', '!=', 'previewed');
rus._query();
if (rus._next())
{
    var remoteUpdateSetSysId = rus.getValue('sys_id');

    
}

var progress_id = (function() {
    if (rus.remote_base_update_set.nil()) {
        gs.info("Starting update set preview for: " + rus.name);
        return new UpdateSetPreviewAjax().previewRemoteUpdateSetAgain(rus);
    } else {

        //This is part of a batch, and it should run the batch previewer
        var updateSet = new GlideRecord("sys_remote_update_set");
        updateSet.get(rus.remote_base_update_set);
        if (!updateSet.isValidRecord())
            throw Error('Base UpdateSet not found for '.concat(rus.getLink(true)));

        //Cancel any running trackers on the batch
        var tracker = new GlideRecord('sys_execution_tracker');
        tracker.addQuery("source", updateSet.sys_id);
        tracker.addQuery("source_table", "sys_remote_update_set");
        tracker.addQuery("state", "IN", "pending,running");
        tracker.orderByDesc("sys_created_on");
        tracker.query();
        while (tracker.next()) {
            gs.info("Tracker found and cancelling: " + updateSet.sys_id);
            var previewer = new UpdateSetPreviewAjax();
            previewer.sendCancelSignal(tracker.sys_id);
        }
        // END Cancel any running trackers on the batch

        gs.info("Starting update set batch preview for: " + updateSet.name);

        return new HierarchyUpdateSetPreviewAjax().previewRemoteHierarchyUpdateSetAgain(updateSet);
    }
})();

gs.info("UpdateSetPreviewer completed progress_id: {0}", progress_id);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-10-21 16:03:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>990b4087db2c04106fedf53a299619e0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Jenkins - Preview Update Set</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_990b4087db2c04106fedf53a299619e0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-10-22 05:38:51</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=990b4087db2c04106fedf53a299619e0"/></record_update>
